body: Most of the fanbase is Noe and Shin'ichirō, few sympathize with Hiromi. It would only work with Noe.

NTR horrible. First because Jun never loved Hiromi, he loved it was his sister and was struggling to beat her brother complex, nor did she like him. Jun left with Hiromi because Shin'ichirō asked and he was going out with his sister, Noe.
The jealousy were from Hiromi towards Noe, in episode 12 she told Noe to move away from the Shin'ichirō and showed hostility to her. She was unsure to the end with Shin'ichirō because of Noe.The most logical scene would be Noe and Shin'ichirō having sex.
@ImAguest did you not see the smile of the girl at the end? she's probably fucking this dude to get the MC jealous
just a reminder, NTR isn't just about "stealing" its about empathizing with the MC through a strong emotion that is frequently through rage or loss.
That'a pretty long rant for such a short hentai lol

Starting tha I didn't see the anime I just have to say that this is a doujinshi made just because the author wanted to make a voyeurism manga and call it NTR.
No story, the art is shitty AND she willing fucking with the guy.
The voyeur may be in love, but in this doujinshi it's said plain and clear that SHE choosed to go out with the other.
And he himself say "I can't stop them professing their love".
So I dunno why NTR is in the title
